title: Stay Alert Even When You Sleep
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hey everyone~! Huh, is there no one here yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Geez, even though Kasumin brought my special buns Kasumin prepared since yesterday night~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fwaah.... Let’s just rest up a bit until everyone else comes....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....Hnnn~, eh, did Kasumin fall asleep?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ah, fufu, good morning, Kasumi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Good morning~, geez, you three are late, Kasumin has been here for a long time, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-, I’m sorry. Fufu.... I happened to meet Shizuku-san and Rina-san, they gave me a little hand on some student council work, fufufu....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s right.... Fufu, no, I can’t hold it in anymore.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What are you three laughing at.... wait, why is my hair like this~~!? It’s like a topknot!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ahaha! You did the same to my hair the other day, right? It’s payback~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Shizuku-chan was so excited when she was tying your hair, Kasumi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeeh, you two also enjoyed it, no, Rina-san, Shioriko-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Kasumi-san, you’re still cute even with that hairstyle. How do I put this.... you remind me of a small dog.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Shioko, is that supposed to be a compliment!? Grrrr, how frustrating....! Kasumin will play a prank on the three of you next time, remember that~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
